description: Creates unit fraction number line for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for create_unit_fraction_number_line
result = create_unit_fraction_number_line(data)

educational_standards.description: Identify visual models that represent unit fractions (1/n).
Understand a fraction a/b as the quantity formed by a parts of size 1/b.
Represent a fraction a/b with a fraction model.
Recognize that the length of the interval created by marking off a lengths 1/b on a number line has a size of a/b.

educational_standards.display_name: Represent Fractions on a Number Line
educational_standards.description: Represent a fraction a/b on a number line diagram by marking off a lengths 1/b from 0, recognizinng that the resulting interval has size a/b and that its endpoint locates the number a/b on the number line.

educational_standards.display_name: Measuring Objects in Centimeters and Millimeters
educational_standards.description: Use rulers to measure objects in centimeters and millimeters.

educational_standards.display_name: Solving Time and Measurement Problems with Fractions
educational_standards.description: Use the four operations to solve word problems involving distances, intervals of time, liquid volumes, or masses of objects involving simple fractions
Convert between mixed numbers and improper fractions.
Model tenths with decimals and mixed numbers.
Identify place value of digits in decimal numbers.
Locate numbers written in decimal notation on a number line diagram.
